    • Method Detail

      • upload

        public ErrorCode upload(java.lang.String title,
               User user,
               java.lang.String path,
               Genre genre,
               Label label,
               Album album,
               java.lang.String newAlbumName,
               java.lang.String coverPath,
               java.lang.Object albumCreator)
        Tries to upload the medium with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the song
        user - The publishing artist
        path - The path of the file or null, if no file was selected
        genre - The genre of the song
        label - The publishing label
        album - The album to add this song to
        newAlbumName - The name for the album if it has to be created
        coverPath - The path of the cover if the album has to be created
        albumCreator - The creator of the new album
        Returns:
        Returns a fitting error code

      • isPlayable

        public boolean isPlayable(java.io.File f)
        Checks if the given file is playable.
        Parameters:
        f - The file to check
        Returns:
        true, if the file is playable, else false

        public void promoteUserToArtist(java.awt.Component parent,
                       User user)
        Asks the user to input a pseudonym if no pseudonym was set before.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent component that shows the dialog
        user - The user that gets promoted

      • getSelectableUsers

        public User[] getSelectableUsers(Label label)
        Gets the users that can get selected in the upload dialog, depending on the selected label.
        Parameters:
        label - The currently selected label
        Returns:
        An array containing all selectable users
